title: Hellboy Animated Series - Blood and Iron
description:
From http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hellboy:_Blood_and_Iron:

\"Hellboy: Blood and Iron is the second in the Hellboy Animated series (the first being Hellboy: Sword of Storms), written by Tad Stones and Mike Mignola. It first aired on March 17, 2007 on Cartoon Network and was scheduled on DVD by Anchor Bay Entertainment in 10 March, 2007. The film\&#039;s storyline is based in part upon the Wake the Devil storyline from the original comics.\"
